answers: The 13 stripes represent the thirteen British colonies that declared independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain, and became the first states in the U.S.
The 50 stars on the flag represent the 50 states of the United States of America
13 stars each representing one of the thirteen colonies
name: americanFlag
